com.geolud.atomica.objects

Class DefaultGameSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • com.geolud.atomica.objects.GameSettings
        • com.geolud.atomica.objects.DefaultGameSettings
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable

    public class DefaultGameSettings
extends GameSettings
    Represents the default settings defining a game. It sets the required levels, the board size and the base factor.
    Author:
    Georg Ludewig
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
